divs: sighting detailswas traveling west on rt4, just coming out of woodstock vt at 9:01pm, (checked time because i texted someone within a minute of this siting)something caught my eye, about 3\4 up from line of site through windsheid. a white glowing orb apprx 20-30ft in diameter, estimated about 800ft in alltitude over a hilly area,traveling west by northwest at est, 300knots. for a split second i thought it was a meteor but there was no trail behind it. no landing lights, no visible exit source for thrust (turbine), just a big glowing ball that went just about above me then traveled in a straightline til a mountain hide it's view. immediatly texted afriend flipping out. first time ever seeing anything.
Summary: White glowing orb, 300knots traveling west by northwest, 800ft alltitude in vermont
trends: There have been no other sightings in Woodstock
This sighting has never been favorited.
